metadata.name: 光 Hikari
metadata.description:
This work is an interpretation of Okada's Purifying Therapy, which uses the powerful healing mechanism inherent in Nature, was initially formulated by Mokichi Okada. 

I decided to make this audiovisual piece to be able to share my experience when giving and receiving therapy. It has taken me almost 1 year of realization, not only for the technical part but for the mental preparation and it is spiritual to be able to transmit what I have felt when living the therapy.


Hikari means: 光light

Size: 2160x2700
MP4
